billing_payment_method_add_selected_comm: By clicking "Add", you will be redirected to the secure payment platform.
billing_payment_method_add_selected_payp: By clicking "Add", you will be redirected to the PayPal platform.
billing_payment_method_add_selected_orig: By clicking "Add", a document will download. Please follow the procedure described in the document to validate the payment method.
billing_payment_method_add_credit_card_s: Your credit card will be activated automatically.
To register a new bank card, a total of {{ amount }} is temporarily deducted from your bank account, to check your card details and their validity. The total of {{ amount }} will not be charged.
To register a new bank card, a small amount of money is temporarily deducted from your bank account in order to check your card's details and validity. This amount will not be charged.
billing_payment_method_add_bank_account_: Your bank account will be validated between 24 and 48 hours from the point at which you sign the procedure (the document that will be downloadable once the bank account has been added).
billing_payment_method_add_default_payme: This payment method will be used for automatic payment for your product. You can change this at any time via your payment methods. You will receive an email notification before each expiry date.
billing_payment_method_add_set_as_defaul: I want to choose this as my default payment method as soon as it is validated.
billing_payment_method_add_bank_account_: Surname and first name of owner or organisation owner
The format for your IBAN number is not correct.
The format for your BIC code is not correct.
billing_payment_method_add_info: A new tab will open for you to finish adding your payment method. If the tab does not open, please click on this link.
billing_payment_method_add_bank_account_: The bank account has been added. It will be active once it has been validated. Please follow the procedure described in this document to validate the payment, and send it to us by post. Your bank account will be validated between 24-48 hours after we have received your payment authorisation.
billing_payment_method_add_load_error: An error has occurred loading the page.
billing_payment_method_add_status_cancel: Your request to add a payment method has been cancelled. As a result, your payment method has not been linked to your OVH account.
billing_payment_method_add_status_error: An error has occurred adding the payment method.
billing_payment_method_add_status_failur: An error has occurred adding the payment method.
billing_payment_method_add_status_pendin: The payment method addition has been switched to pending status.
billing_payment_method_add_status_succes: Your payment method has been added.
billing_payment_method_add_vantiv_recove: An error has occurred adding your payment method. Please check your payment card number, and try re-entering it.
An error has occurred adding your payment method. Please check the validation number for your payment card, and try re-entering it.
